scripts.test: lab -r console -o stdout -r html -o build/report/coverage.html -r lcov -o build/report/lcov.info
scripts.package: pushd build/tmp && cp -rf ../../package.json ../../src/* . && npm i --production && zip -r -1 ../employee.zip * && popd
scripts.sam.package: npm run package && sam package --template-file employee.yaml  --s3-bucket dschmitz.fis.2.0.employee --output-template-file build/employee-packaged.yaml
scripts.sam.deploy: npm run sam.package && sam deploy  --template-file ./build/employee-packaged.yaml --stack-name fis-2-0-employee --capabilities CAPABILITY_NAMED_IAM
